text: Tamara Erin Klicman (or Tami Erin; July 8, 1974) is an American actress. She played the character of Pippi Longstocking in the 1988 movie The New Adventures of Pippi Longstocking. She was born in the Chicago metropolitan area. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of Tami Erin * Category:Actors from Illinois Category:American movie actors Category:People from Wheaton, Illinois Category:1974 births Category:Living people
title: Tami Erin
